messages.content: You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue from orders placed by customers in the 'Retail' segment in 2023?

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_revenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID JOIN customerCustomerDemo cd ON c.CustomerID = cd.CustomerID JOIN customerDemographics dd ON cd.CustomerTypeID = dd.CustomerTypeID WHERE dd.CustomerDesc = 'Retail' AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have a discount applied?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT OrderID) AS OrdersWithDiscount FROM [Order Details] WHERE Discount > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the Customer Retention Rate for the last month.

WITH PreviousOrders AS (SELECT DISTINCT CustomerID FROM orders WHERE OrderDate < DATEADD(MONTH, -1, CURDATE())), CurrentOrders AS (SELECT DISTINCT CustomerID FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN DATEADD(MONTH, -1, CURDATE()) AND CURDATE()) SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CurrentOrders WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM PreviousOrders)) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PreviousOrders) AS CustomerRetentionRate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the inventory turnover ratio for each product for the past month.

SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName, (SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock)) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID WHERE od.OrderDate >= DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE()) GROUP BY p.ProductID, p.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers have the shortest lead times?

SELECT p.SupplierID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS avg_lead_time FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.SupplierID ORDER BY avg_lead_time ASC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average order value for each customer.

SELECT customers.CustomerID, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) as AvgOrderValue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the on-time delivery rate for each month in the past year?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ShippedDate <= o.RequiredDate THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / COUNT(o.OrderID) AS on_time_delivery_rate FROM orders o GROUP BY month
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred for orders shipped last month?
SELECT SUM(orders.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orders.ShippedDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(orders.ShippedDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) - 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most frequently ordered product?

SELECT ProductID, ProductName, COUNT([Order Details].OrderID) AS OrderFrequency FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY ProductID ORDER BY OrderFrequency DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the top 5 customers by total sales revenue in 2023?

SELECT CustomerID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order fulfillment time?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the highest unit price among products supplied by each supplier?
SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, MAX(products.UnitPrice) AS MaxUnitPrice FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many days on average does it take for employees to ship an order from the order date?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS AvgShippingTime FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID WHERE orders.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the products with the highest and lowest unit prices.
SELECT (SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice FROM products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice FROM products ORDER BY UnitPrice ASC LIMIT 1)
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product category has the most units in stock?
SELECT CategoryID, SUM(UnitsInStock) AS TotalStock FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY TotalStock DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest reorder level?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName, ReorderLevel FROM products ORDER BY ReorderLevel DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were shipped after the required date in June 2023?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Late_Orders FROM orders WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') = '2023-06' AND ShippedDate > RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the top 3 suppliers by the total number of units supplied.
SELECT s.SupplierName, SUM(UnitsOnOrder) AS TotalUnits FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.SupplierID = s.SupplierID GROUP BY s.SupplierName ORDER BY TotalUnits DESC LIMIT 3;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all orders placed by CustomerID 'C123' in 2023.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE CustomerID = 'C123' AND OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the names of all products that are currently stocked in inventory?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee had the highest sales in the last year?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE orders.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest total discount applied?

SELECT products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].Discount * [Order Details].Quantity * [Order Details].UnitPrice) AS TotalDiscount FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductName ORDER BY TotalDiscount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average unit price of all products in the inventory?
SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) AS AveragePrice FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders placed in November 2023?
SELECT COUNT(o.OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders o WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-11-01' AND '2023-11-30';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which regions have the most suppliers?
SELECT Region, COUNT(DISTINCT SupplierID) AS SupplierCount FROM suppliers GROUP BY Region ORDER BY SupplierCount DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average quantity per unit for products supplied by a specific supplier?
SELECT SupplierID, AVG(LEFT(QuantityPerUnit, CHARINDEX(' ', QuantityPerUnit + ' ') - 1)) as AverageQuantityPerUnit FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have more than 100 units in stock?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock > 100
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average reorder level for each product category.
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(ReorderLevel) AS AverageReorderLevel FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the employees who have a total sales amount above the average total sales amount of all employees.

SELECT e.EmployeeID FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID HAVING SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) > (SELECT AVG(TotalSales) FROM (SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY o.EmployeeID) AS AvgTotalSales);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales value for each product?

SELECT products.ProductName, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM products JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID GROUP BY products.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of orders shipped in the first half of the year?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'Number of Orders Shipped' FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate BETWEEN DATEADD(YEAR, YEAR(GETDATE()), 'YYYY-01-01') AND DATEADD(YEAR, YEAR(GETDATE()), 'YYYY-06-30');
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the employee with the most orders in the current year.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, COUNT(*) AS OrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE YEAR(o.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost for orders shipped via each shipping method?
SELECT ShipVia, AVG(Freight) AS 'Average Shipping Cost' FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the customers who have not placed any orders in the last year.

SELECT customers.CustomerID, customers.CompanyName FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID WHERE orders.OrderID IS NULL OR orders.OrderDate < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers provide the most products?
SELECT SupplierID, COUNT(ProductID) FROM products GROUP BY SupplierID ORDER BY COUNT(ProductID) DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many times each product was ordered in the first half of 2023?
SELECT od.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS quantity_ordered FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' GROUP BY od.ProductID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average fulfillment time for orders placed in January 2023?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) AS avg_fulfillment_time FROM orders WHERE orders.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31'
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the percentage of discontinued products?
SELECT COUNT(ProductID) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products) AS PercentageOfDiscontinuedProducts FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred for orders handled by each employee?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(o.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the total sales generated in each country.

SELECT e.Country, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.Country
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping company has the highest on-time delivery rate?
SELECT ShipVia, (COUNT(OrderID) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(OrderID) FROM orders WHERE ShipVia=o.ShipVia)) AS 'On-time Delivery Rate' FROM orders o WHERE ShippedDate <= RequiredDate GROUP BY ShipVia;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many discontinued products are in the inventory?
SELECT COUNT(ProductID) FROM products WHERE Discontinued = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average order value for January 2023.

SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT orders.OrderID) AS AverageOrderValue FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE MONTH(orders.OrderDate) = 1 AND YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales generated by each product category?

SELECT c.CategoryName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID GROUP BY c.CategoryName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have the highest and lowest average order values?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AvgOrderValue FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY AvgOrderValue DESC LIMIT 1 UNION ALL SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AvgOrderValue FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY AvgOrderValue ASC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average price of products in each category?
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AveragePrice FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many different categories of products does the inventory have?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CategoryID) AS CategoryCount FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated in the last quarter?

SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURDATE()
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer had the highest lifetime value?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS CustomerLifetimeValue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID ORDER BY CustomerLifetimeValue DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most frequent shipping method used?
SELECT shippers.CompanyName, COUNT(orders.OrderID) AS order_count FROM orders JOIN shippers ON orders.ShipVia = shippers.ShipperID GROUP BY shippers.CompanyName ORDER BY order_count DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest inventory turnover ratio?

SELECT p.ProductID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS inventory_turnover_ratio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY inventory_turnover_ratio DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the total number of unique customers who have placed orders.
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total revenue from orders that included a discount.

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(OD.UnitPrice * OD.Quantity * (1 - OD.Discount)) AS TotalRevenueWithDiscount FROM orders O JOIN [Order Details] OD ON O.OrderID = OD.OrderID WHERE OD.Discount > 0 GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for orders shipped via shipping method 1?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AvgFreightCost FROM orders WHERE ShipVia = 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have a birthday this month?
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE MONTH(BirthDate) = MONTH(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average shipping cost for orders shipped to 'USA'?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS AverageShippingCost FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'USA'
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What was the total sales revenue generated in Q1 of 2023?
SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_sales FROM [Order Details] od JOIN orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31'
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the names and contact titles of all customers in Germany?
SELECT ContactName, ContactTitle FROM customers WHERE Country = 'Germany';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What was the total lifetime value of each customer as of Q2 2023?

SELECT customers.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS customer_lifetime_value FROM [Order Details] JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID JOIN customers ON orders.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID GROUP BY customers.CustomerID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total sales and average sales per order for each employee.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales, AVG(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS AverageSalesPerOrder FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied on orders by each employee?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, AVG([Order Details].Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the total discount given across all orders in the last quarter.
SELECT SUM([Order Details].Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE QUARTER(orders.OrderDate) = QUARTER(CURDATE()) - 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders had a freight cost greater than $100 in November 2023?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Order_Count FROM orders WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') = '2023-11' AND Freight > 100;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products are low in stock and need reordering?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock <= ReorderLevel
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the total freight cost managed by each employee.
SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM(orders.Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders INNER JOIN employees ON orders.EmployeeID = employees.EmployeeID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product had the highest total sales revenue in April 2023?

SELECT [Order Details].ProductID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS Total_Sales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(orders.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') = '2023-04' GROUP BY [Order Details].ProductID ORDER BY Total_Sales DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders have been shipped but not yet delivered by each employee?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, COUNT(*) AS UndeliveredOrders FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE o.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL AND o.RequiredDate >= CURDATE() GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all suppliers based in the 'USA'.
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE Country = 'USA';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the orders that were shipped late (ShippedDate > RequiredDate).
SELECT o.OrderID, o.RequiredDate, o.ShippedDate FROM orders o WHERE o.ShippedDate > o.RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales amount generated by each employee?

SELECT e.EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the products that have never been ordered.
SELECT products.ProductID, products.ProductName FROM products LEFT JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID WHERE [Order Details].OrderID IS NULL;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most common shipping country?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY Count DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total discount applied to each product?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Discount) AS TotalDiscount FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many distinct customers placed orders this month?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM orders WHERE MONTH(OrderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products contribute to 80% of total sales?

SELECT p.ProductName FROM (SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) DESC) AS SalesRank FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName) WHERE SalesRank <= 80;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average order value?
SELECT AVG([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS AverageOrderValue FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the inventory turnover ratio for each month.

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(od.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) / AVG(p.UnitsInStock) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have fewer units in stock than their reorder level?
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products ordered in the last month?
SELECT SUM(Quantity) FROM [Order Details] WHERE OrderDate >= DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE());
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount applied to all order details?
SELECT AVG(Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM [Order Details];
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales generated by each employee?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales generated by employees grouped by their title?

SELECT employees.Title, SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY employees.Title
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List all suppliers based in Germany.
SELECT CompanyName, City FROM suppliers WHERE Country = 'Germany';
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the most popular product based on the number of orders?

SELECT ProductName, COUNT([Order Details].OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM [Order Details] JOIN products ON [Order Details].ProductID = products.ProductID GROUP BY ProductName ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the average quantity per unit for products that are currently in stock.
SELECT AVG(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(QuantityPerUnit, ' ', 1) AS UNSIGNED)) AS AverageQuantityPerUnit FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock > 0;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Who is the supplier with the most number of products?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID, suppliers.CompanyName, COUNT(products.ProductID) AS ProductCount FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID ORDER BY ProductCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which Employee has managed the highest number of orders?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) as OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 most expensive products supplied?
SELECT ProductName FROM products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders did each employee process in the last year?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID WHERE o.OrderDate > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers have shipped orders in less time than the required date?

SELECT suppliers.CompanyName FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN [Order Details] ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = orders.OrderID WHERE orders.ShippedDate < orders.RequiredDate GROUP BY suppliers.CompanyName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Analyze the monthly trend of units on order.
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(O.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(od.Quantity) AS UnitsOnOrder FROM orders O JOIN [Order Details] od ON O.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average time taken to ship an order by each employee?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AverageShipTime FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products sold to each country?
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY ShipCountry;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product category generated the most revenue in 2023?

SELECT c.CategoryName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_revenue FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE od.OrderID IN (SELECT o.OrderID FROM orders o WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31') GROUP BY c.CategoryName ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.ProductName, ((SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) - LAG(SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY p.ProductID ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(O.OrderDate, '%Y-%m'))) / LAG(SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY p.ProductID ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(O.OrderDate, '%Y-%m'))) * 100 AS SalesGrowthRate FROM [Order Details] od JOIN products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN orders O ON od.OrderID = O.OrderID GROUP BY p.ProductID, DATE_FORMAT(O.OrderDate, '%Y-%m');

You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have more than 10 years of service?
SELECT EmployeeID, CONCAT(FirstName, ' ', LastName) AS FullName FROM employees WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), HireDate) > 365 * 10
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the minimum, maximum, and average salaries of employees in each region?
SELECT Region, MIN(Salary) AS MinSalary, MAX(Salary) AS MaxSalary, AVG(Salary) AS AvgSalary FROM employees GROUP BY Region;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have not been ordered in the last six months?

SELECT P.ProductID, P.ProductName FROM products P LEFT JOIN [Order Details] OD ON P.ProductID = OD.ProductID WHERE OD.OrderID IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), (SELECT MAX(O.OrderDate) FROM orders O JOIN [Order Details] OD2 ON O.OrderID = OD2.OrderID WHERE OD2.ProductID = P.ProductID)) > 180;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find customers and their respective cities who have placed an order in 2023.
SELECT customers.CustomerID, customers.City FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given on all products?
SELECT AVG(Discount) AS AverageDiscount FROM [Order Details]
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the names and titles of all employees?
SELECT FirstName, LastName, Title FROM employees;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping method is used the most?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(OrderID) AS ShippingMethodCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY ShippingMethodCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost incurred for orders shipped via each shipping company in 2023?
SELECT s.CompanyName, SUM(o.Freight) AS total_freight_cost FROM orders o JOIN shippers s ON o.ShipVia = s.ShipperID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY s.CompanyName
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 most expensive products by unit price?
SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice FROM products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest number of on-time shipments?
SELECT EmployeeID, COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeShipments FROM orders WHERE ShippedDate <= RequiredDate GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY OnTimeShipments DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total revenue generated from orders in March 2023?

SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE MONTH(orders.OrderDate) = 3 AND YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = 2023;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue for each month?
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(OD.UnitPrice * OD.Quantity * (1 - OD.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders O JOIN [Order Details] OD ON O.OrderID = OD.OrderID GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Determine the employee who has handled the most high-value orders.

SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS HighValueOrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity > 500 GROUP BY e.EmployeeID
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which regions have the highest customer retention rates?

SELECT Region, COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) FROM customers WHERE Region = c.Region) AS RetentionRate FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY c.Region ORDER BY RetentionRate DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest freight cost associated with their orders?

SELECT employees.EmployeeID, SUM(orders.Freight) AS TotalFreightCost FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.EmployeeID = orders.EmployeeID GROUP BY employees.EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalFreightCost DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List products that need to be reordered (units in stock lower than reorder level).
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employees have the highest sales performances in 2023?

SELECT EmployeeID, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average selling price of products in each category?
SELECT CategoryID, AVG(UnitPrice) AS AveragePrice FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which country had the highest number of orders in 2023?
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(*) AS NumberOfOrders FROM orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the retention rate of customers from January 2022 to December 2022?

SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN orders.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' THEN orders.CustomerID END))::float / (COUNT(DISTINCT orders.CustomerID WHERE orders.OrderDate < '2022-01-01')) AS RetentionRate FROM orders;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the number of orders placed each month in 2023.
SELECT YEAR(OrderDate) AS Year, MONTH(OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(OrderDate) = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(OrderDate), MONTH(OrderDate);
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the total sales for each product?
SELECT P.ProductID, P.ProductName, SUM(OD.Quantity * OD.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM products P JOIN [Order Details] OD ON P.ProductID = OD.ProductID GROUP BY P.ProductID, P.ProductName;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Calculate the average units on order for all products.
SELECT AVG(UnitsOnOrder) FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total quantity of products ordered by each customer?
SELECT orders.CustomerID, SUM([Order Details].Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY orders.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have a stock level below the reorder level?
SELECT ProductName FROM products WHERE UnitsInStock < ReorderLevel;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the month with the highest on-time delivery rate.

SELECT MONTH(OrderDate) AS OrderMonth, (COUNT(OrderID) FILTER (WHERE ShippedDate <= RequiredDate)) * 100.0 / COUNT(OrderID) AS OnTimeDeliveryRate FROM orders GROUP BY MONTH(OrderDate) ORDER BY OnTimeDeliveryRate DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total number of units of all products currently in stock?
SELECT SUM(UnitsInStock) AS TotalStock FROM products;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which products have the highest stock levels currently?
SELECT ProductName, UnitsInStock FROM products ORDER BY UnitsInStock DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Find the products with the lowest sales volume in the last month.

SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSold FROM products p JOIN [Order Details] od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID WHERE OrderDate >= DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) GROUP BY p.ProductName ORDER BY TotalSold ASC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What are the top 5 cities by order count?
SELECT ShipCity, COUNT(OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCity ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 5;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many employees were hired in the last 5 years?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS HiredInLast5Years FROM employees WHERE HireDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR)
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the monthly total sales for the year 2023?

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders o JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY Month;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Identify the shipper (ShipVia) that handled the most orders.
SELECT O.ShipVia, COUNT(O.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM orders O GROUP BY O.ShipVia ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total freight cost for orders shipped to the USA?
SELECT SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'USA'
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which suppliers have delivered products within a week on average?

SELECT suppliers.SupplierID FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.SupplierID = products.SupplierID JOIN orders ON products.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY suppliers.SupplierID HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(orders.ShippedDate, orders.OrderDate)) <= 7;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average discount given per order by each employee?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, AVG(od.Discount) AS AvgDiscountByOrder FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID JOIN [Order Details] od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which country has the highest total freight costs?
SELECT ShipCountry, SUM(Freight) AS TotalFreight FROM orders GROUP BY ShipCountry ORDER BY TotalFreight DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What percentage of orders from the USA were delivered on time?
SELECT COUNT(OrderID) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS OnTimeRate FROM orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'USA' AND ShippedDate <= RequiredDate;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
List the customers and their total order count, but only for customers from the United States.

SELECT customers.CustomerID, customers.CompanyName, COUNT(orders.OrderID) as OrderCount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.CustomerID = orders.CustomerID WHERE customers.Country = 'USA' GROUP BY customers.CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which city has the highest number of suppliers?
SELECT City, COUNT(SupplierID) AS SupplierCount FROM suppliers GROUP BY City ORDER BY SupplierCount DESC LIMIT 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How many orders were placed per each customer?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM orders GROUP BY CustomerID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which shipping method is used most frequently?
SELECT ShipVia, COUNT(*) AS Frequency FROM orders GROUP BY ShipVia ORDER BY Frequency DESC
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which product categories contain the largest number of products?
SELECT CategoryID, COUNT(ProductID) FROM products GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY COUNT(ProductID) DESC;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the total sales revenue generated last month?

SELECT SUM([Order Details].UnitPrice * [Order Details].Quantity * (1 - [Order Details].Discount)) AS TotalSales FROM orders JOIN [Order Details] ON orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID WHERE YEAR(orders.OrderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(orders.OrderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) - 1;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
What is the average freight cost for orders shipped within the same city?
SELECT AVG(Freight) AS 'Average Freight Cost' FROM orders WHERE ShipCity = orders.ShipCity;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
How is the shipping performance varying by different employees?
SELECT EmployeeID, AVG(DATEDIFF(ShippedDate, OrderDate)) AS AvgFulfillmentTime FROM orders GROUP BY EmployeeID ORDER BY EmployeeID;
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which employee has the highest order count?
SELECT e.EmployeeID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM employees e JOIN orders o ON e.EmployeeID = o.EmployeeID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID ORDER BY OrderCount DESC LIMIT 1
You are querying the MDDX database, what is the SQL query for the following question?
Which customer placed the most orders in the last 6 months?
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(OrderID) AS 'Number of Orders' FROM orders WHERE OrderDate >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY COUNT(OrderID) DESC LIMIT 1;
